trans-unit.source: Calculates the required size of the window rectangle, based on the desired size of the client rectangle

seg-source.mrk: Calculates the required size of the window rectangle, based on the desired size of the client rectangle

target.mrk: Calculates the required size of the window rectangle, based on the desired size of the client rectangle

trans-unit.source: $tagRECT structure that contains the coordinates of the desired client area. This structure must be created before function call.

seg-source.mrk: $tagRECT structure that contains the coordinates of the desired client area.
This structure must be created before function call.

target.mrk: $tagRECT structure that contains the coordinates of the desired client area.
This structure must be created before function call.

trans-unit.source: The window style of the window whose required size is to be calculated. Note that you cannot specify the $WS_OVERLAPPED style.

seg-source.mrk: The window style of the window whose required size is to be calculated.
Note that you cannot specify the $WS_OVERLAPPED style.

target.mrk: The window style of the window whose required size is to be calculated.
Note that you cannot specify the $WS_OVERLAPPED style.

trans-unit.source: [optional] The extended window style of the window whose required size is to be calculated.

seg-source.mrk: The extended window style of the window whose required size is to be calculated.

target.mrk: The extended window style of the window whose required size is to be calculated.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Specifies whether the window has a menu, valid values:

seg-source.mrk: Specifies whether the window has a menu, valid values:

target.mrk: Specifies whether the window has a menu, valid values:

trans-unit.source: True - The window has a menu.

seg-source.mrk: True - The window has a menu.

target.mrk: True - The window has a menu.

trans-unit.source: False - The window does not has a menu (Default).

seg-source.mrk: False - The window does not has a menu (Default).

target.mrk: False - The window does not has a menu (Default).

trans-unit.source: False, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information.

seg-source.mrk: False, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information.

target.mrk: False, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information.
